name: GRIEF (itch) (malmerida)
description:
GRIEF is a short 2-5mn game I made a few years back. It's very personal to me and I'm releasing it to see if some people relate to what I was trying to express.

It was initially a M&K game but it also works well with VR.

Please come forward with any bugs you may find.

if you like my stuff you can visit my artstation :

https://www.artstation.com/malmerida

Objective:

It's pretty straightforward. You just have to find a way out of the loop, and there are three endings.

Controls:

- QWERTY (or AZERTY) for movement.

- CTRL to Crouch, SHIFT to sprint.

- There is no action button.

VR Controls: 

VR works although I only tested it myself with a WMR so it might have some unforeseen bugs.

You can use controller or mouse/keyboard, seated or standing up, however you want it.

- [8](numpad) and [2](numpad) to adjust height.

- [4](numpad) and [6](numpad) to snap rotate.

- VR Controllers are not necessary. You can use keyboard or PC controller.
